original_text: For David, after he had served the purpose of God in his own generation, fell asleep and was laid with his fathers and saw corruption,
korean_text: 다윗은 당시에 하나님의 뜻을 따라 섬기다가 잠들어 그 조상들과 함께 묻혀 썩음을 당하였으되

sentences.original_text: after he had served the purpose of God in his own generation,
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 시대에 하나님의 뜻을 섬긴 후에,

sentences.original_text: and was laid with his fathers
